programme.title: Mujhse Shaadi Karoge
programme.desc: When Ankita manages to impress Paras and win the task, Heena questions her integrity. Later, mastermind Vikas Gupta enters the house.(n)

programme.title: Naati Pinky Ki Lambi Love Story
programme.desc: As Laxman and Ram recall their childhood memories, Arjun regains consciousness. Nandu hugs him while Pinky questions him about how he tripped from the terrace, Arjun lies.(n)

programme.title: The Great Indian Global Kitchen
programme.desc: The chef cooks traditional Indian recipes with an international touch to them and improves the flavour and the style of presentation according to global standards.(n)

programme.title: Barrister Babu
programme.desc: As Bondita opens up about her bladder problems to Saudamini, the latter decides to use it to separate her and Anirudh. Meanwhile, Anirudh decides to make a community toilet for the local women.(n)

programme.title: Choti Sarrdaarni
programme.desc: Sarabjeet apologises to Meher and assures her to reconcile with her. Following this, he asks his family members to gather in order to expose Perry's evil intentions.(n)

programme.title: Shakti Astitva Ke Ehsaas Ki
programme.desc: Virat and Heer get married to each other without their families in a temple. However, things soon take a dramatic turn as their respective families arrive.(n)

programme.title: Shubharamabh
programme.desc: After being denied entry into Raja's house, Rani manages to sneak into his residence. Later, she overhears a conversation about Raja's family property.(n)

programme.title: Naati Pinky Ki Lambi Love Story
programme.desc: Gagan threatens Arjun and Nalini in the hospital before fleeing the country. An indignant Pinky files a police complaint against him while Laxman stumbles upon Gagan's watch at the incident spot.(n)

programme.title: Mujhse Shaadi Karoge
programme.desc: When Vikas Gupta assigns an intriguing task, Balraj expresses his feelings towards Ankita. Later, Shehnaaz's attitude leaves Vikas fuming.(n)

programme.title: The Great Indian Global Kitchen
programme.desc: The chef cooks traditional Indian recipes with an international touch to them and improves the flavour and the style of presentation according to global standards.(n)

programme.title: Vidya
programme.desc: Vidya breathes a huge sigh of relief as the officer allows her to write the exam. On the other hand, Munni's mother tries to inform the locals about Vidya's truth but no one believes her.(n)

programme.title: Barrister Babu

programme.desc: After learning about Meher's pregnancy, her politically ambitious mother, Kulwant Kaur, gets her lover killed and forces her to marry Sarabjeet, a well-connected widower with a five-year-old son.(n)
